Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Relates to public health emergency allowances against sentences for certain incarcerated individuals
Summary: Relates to public health emergency allowances against sentences for certain incarcerated individuals; allows up to twelve months of public health emergency allowances to be given to incarcerated individuals during a public health crisis.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to public health emergency allowances against sentences for certain incarcerated individuals
